title: Mastering Stripe Payments
description: A comprehensive course on building payment integrations using Stripe and Next.js, covering subscriptions, webhooks, and best practices.

title: Stripe Subscriptions Bootcamp
description: Build robust subscription billing with Stripe, handling trials, promos, and proration.

title: Stripe Webhooks & Security
description: Deep dive into secure webhook handling, signature verification, and retry strategies.

title: Checkout and Client Integration
description: Implement Stripe Checkout and client-side integrations for fast, PCI-compliant flows.

title: Advanced Invoicing with Stripe
description: Automate invoicing, custom invoice templates, and hosted invoices with Stripe.

title: Payments Analytics & Reporting
description: Track payments, reconcile transactions, and build dashboards from Stripe data.

title: Connect Platforms & Marketplaces
description: Create multi-party payments using Stripe Connect and handle onboarding flows.

title: Fraud Prevention & Radar
description: Use Stripe Radar and best practices to detect and prevent fraudulent transactions.

title: Billing Automation with Next.js
description: Integrate Stripe billing into Next.js apps with serverless functions and edge routes.

title: Complete Stripe Capstone Project
description: End-to-end project combining Checkout, Subscriptions, Webhooks, and Connect into a demo product.
